title: Johnstown Flood National Memorial: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      Park Grounds:The grounds of the park are open sunrise to sunset, seven days a week.Visitor Center:Winter Hours:The park Visitor Center is open 9:00 am to 5:00 pm Saturdays and Sundays only during the winter. Spring/Summer/Fall Hours:Beginning Saturday, April 16, 2016, the Visitor Center will be open from 9:00 am-5:00 pm seven days a week. South Fork Fishing & Hunting Clubhouse:Brief tours of the Clubhouse are offered during our "Journey Around Lake Conemaugh," van tours daily from June to September. In depth tours of the Clubhouse are offered both on or around the Johnstown Flood anniversary of May 31 and our "Path of the Flood" Van Tours offered during the summer months.  Park hours can change due to holidays and inclement weather. Please call (814) 886-6170 if you are traveling a great distance for operating hours and/or information on special events offered during the summer.
